title: QXO Boosts Financing Deal to $3 Billion to Pursue M&A
description: QXO Inc. is raising another $1.8 billion from investors including Apollo Global Management Inc. and Temasek Holdings Pte, comfortably more than doubling the $1.2 billion financing deal it announced last week.
content: QXO Inc. is raising another $1.8 billion from investors including Apollo Global Management Inc. and Temasek Holdings Pte, comfortably more than doubling the $1.2 billion financing deal it announced last week.
